thread.title: Broken Social Scene Performing On Colbert Next Week
thread.title_full: Broken Social Scene Performing On Colbert Next Week

author: James Rettig
title: Broken Social Scene Performing On Colbert Next Week
text:
CREDIT: Nicholas Hunt/Getty Images 
Broken Social Scene will perform on the 3/30 episode of The Late Show With Stephen Colbert . A new BSS album is expected to come out later this year, so does that mean we’re getting new music in advance of the late-night appearance? Maybe? Seems likely? Exciting! Last year, they debuted a new track and earlier this week Feist talked a little bit about the new album in an interview about her own new album, Pleasure . We’ll see soon enough.
